snippet: The Red Caboose has been a bedrock of New York’s hobbyist community since 1970. Four hobby shops used to dot its block, but now it is the only one that remains.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on The Red Caboose, Midtown shop catering to collectors of miniatures, including model trains and buses.
lead_paragraph: The Red Caboose has been a bedrock of New York’s hobbyist community since 1970. Four hobby shops used to dot its block, but now it is the only one that remains.

headline.print_headline: Trains, Planes, Buses. And More Trains.
headline.main: At a Midtown Shop, Trains, Planes, Buses. And More Trains.
